projects.description: Have the screen loop through random qoutes array by clicking submit or after 5 seconds using a timeout funnction
Dynamically list 10 students per page dependent on length of student list and filter according to name search
Create a Form where a person can register for sessions at a conference and order a shirt all while making the Form elements very interactive and handle errors i a user friendly way
Develop a Game using OOP, keep track of score and end game with an appropriate screen

Request via FETCH API a json list of Random Employees with the requested filtering and display their information. Allow the user to click on an employees card and open a Module Window with further employee detail.
